name: Women in Computer Science @ UPenn
tagline: a webapp for all things WiCS
body:
### Welcome to the Women In Computer Science WebApp Documentation.
There are a number of different features that are included here:
1. __Admin access__ - the WiCS board members all have user names to add and create content - whether it is to upload photos, add events, or add opportunities. 
2._ Calendar_ - a JQuery calendar that enables easy access to all upcoming events planned for WiCS. 
3. _Opportunities_ - a look at different applications and opportunities for Women in Computer Science at Penn.
4. _Photo Gallery_ - photos of WiCS events available to view.
5. _Contact_ - a place for the community can make suggestions, report technical problems with the app and recruiters can contact us to plan for events.

### How to run this webapp locally
Run the requirements .py preferably in a virtualenv
```
$ python manage.py runserver
$ python manage.py syncdb
```
Make appropriate adjustments to your database settings in settings.py

### How to navigate the site
left hand menu bar - mobile is not available at this time.

### Authors and Contributors
This app was made with love by Clara Wu (@scwu). Please report any bugs to my email address listed there.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out the documentation at http://help.github.com/pages or contact support@github.com and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
